messages.subject: Free Attitash Mountain in New Hampshire, anyone in for a road trip?
messages.msgSnippet: ... FROM: hmsl2@aol.com DATE: Fri, 13 Jun 2003 09:05:46 EDT SUBJECT: Free Event Friday, June 20th, because Attitash Mountain in New Hampshire is giving
messages.messageBody:
The message summary:
--------------------
FROM: hmsl2@...
DATE: Fri, 13 Jun
2003 09:05:46 EDT
SUBJECT: Free Event

Friday, June 20th, because Attitash
Mountain in New Hampshire
is giving FREE-yes truly FREE- value passes all day for

ANYONE who comes to the ticket booth June 20th. All
activities at Attitash
included in the free value pass, that

day will include: alpine slides,
waterslides, scenic sky
ride, skate park, downhill BMX course, mountain biking,
Buddy
Bear's pool (great for toddlers), trampoline thing and
a rock-climbing wall.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
